verses.verse: Then we turned, <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> up the way <S%H1870><s%> to Bashan: <S%H1316><s%> and Og <S%H5747><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> us, he and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> at Edrei. <S%H154><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Fear <S%H3372><s%> him not: for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> him, and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and his land, <S%H776><s%> into your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to him as you did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> at Heshbon. <S%H2809><s%>

So the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people: <S%H5971><s%> and we smote <S%H5221><s%> him until <S%H5704><s%> none <S%H1115><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> to him remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

And we took <S%H3920><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> there was not a city <S%H7151><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we took <S%H3947><s%> not from them, three score <S%H8346><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> were fenced <S%H1219><s%> with high <S%H1364><s%> walls, <S%H2346><s%> gates, <S%H1817><s%> and bars; <S%H1280><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> unwalled <S%H6519><s%> towns <S%H5892><s%> a great <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>

And we utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, as we did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> the men, <S%H4962><s%> women, <S%H802><s%> and children, <S%H2945><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>
But all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities, <S%H5892><s%> we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> to ourselves.

And we took <S%H3947><s%> at that time <S%H6256><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> that was on <S%H5921><s%> this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> from the river <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon; <S%H2768><s%>
(Which Hermon <S%H2768><s%> the Sidonians <S%H6722><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Sirion; <S%H8303><s%> and the Amorites <S%H567><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> it Shenir; <S%H8149><s%>)

All <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain, <S%H4334><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> to Salchah <S%H5548><s%> and Edrei, <S%H154><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> in Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

For only <S%H7535><s%> Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> of the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of giants; <S%H7497><s%> behold <S%H2009><s%>his bedstead <S%H6210><s%> was a bedstead <S%H6210><s%> of iron; <S%H1270><s%> is it not in Rabbath <S%H7237><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon? <S%H5983><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> was the length <S%H753><s%> thereof, and four <S%H702><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it, after the cubit <S%H520><s%> of a man. <S%H376><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> which we possessed <S%H3423><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> from Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and half <S%H2677><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof, gave <S%H5414><s%> I to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites. <S%H1425><s%>

And the rest <S%H3499><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> being the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og, <S%H5747><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> I to the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the region <S%H2256><s%> of Argob, <S%H709><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of giants. <S%H7497><s%>

Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the country <S%H2256><s%> of Argob <S%H709><s%> to the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of Geshuri <S%H1651><s%> and Maachathi; <S%H4602><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> them after <S%H5921><s%> his own name, <S%H8034><s%> Bashanhavothjair, <S%H1316><s%> <S%H2334><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
And I gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> to Machir. <S%H4353><s%>

And to the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%> and to the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> from Gilead <S%H1568><s%> even to the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon <S%H769><s%> half <S%H8432><s%> the valley, <S%H5158><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> even to the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> which is the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon; <S%H5983><s%>

The plain <S%H6160><s%> also, and Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, from Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the plain, <S%H6160><s%> even the salt <S%H4417><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> Ashdothpisgah <S%H798><s%> <S%H6449><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it: you shall pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that are meet <S%H1121><s%> for the war. <S%H2428><s%>

But your wives, <S%H802><s%> and your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, and your cattle, <S%H4735><s%> (for I know <S%H3045><s%> that you have much <S%H7227><s%> cattle, <S%H4735><s%>) shall abide <S%H3427><s%> in your cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you;

Until <S%H5704><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have given rest <S%H5117><s%> to your brothers, <S%H251><s%> as well as to you, and until they also <S%H1571><s%> possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> them beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan: <S%H3383><s%> and then shall you return <S%H7725><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his possession, <S%H3425><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you.

And I commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> kings: <S%H4428><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> shall the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you pass. <S%H5674><s%>
You shall not fear <S%H3372><s%> them: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> he shall fight <S%H3898><s%> for you.
And I sought <S%H2603><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> you have begun <S%H2490><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> your greatness, <S%H1433><s%> and your mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand: <S%H3027><s%> for what <S%H4310><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is there in heaven <S%H8064><s%> or in earth, <S%H776><s%> that can do <S%H6213><s%> according to your works, <S%H4639><s%> and according to your might? <S%H1369><s%>

I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, let me go <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> that goodly <S%H2896><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and Lebanon. <S%H3844><s%>

But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H5674><s%> with me for your sakes, <S%H4616><s%> and would not hear <S%H8085><s%> me: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Let it suffice <S%H7227><s%> you; speak <S%H1696><s%> no <S%H408><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> to me of this <S%H2088><s%> matter. <S%H1697><s%>

Get <S%H5927><s%> you up into the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> and lift <S%H5375><s%> up your eyes <S%H5869><s%> westward, <S%H3220><s%> and northward, <S%H6828><s%> and southward, <S%H8486><s%> and eastward, <S%H4217><s%> and behold <S%H7200><s%> it with your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> for you shall not go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

But charge <S%H6680><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and encourage <S%H2388><s%> him, and strengthen <S%H553><s%> him: for he shall go <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and he shall cause them to inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall see. <S%H7200><s%>
So we stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H1516><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> Bethpeor. <S%H1047><s%>
